languages.text: {n}Кибелла неслышно возникает подле.{/n} "Ты желал{mf||а} видеть меня, Домин'{name}? Узнать обряды культа? Хорошо. Ты уже в воде. Значит, я могу познакомить тебя с одной из редких практик Кровавой паутины — контролируемым самоутоплением. Мало кому оказывается честь пройти ее — ведь вода бесценна на корабле. Она открыла мне многие истины".

{n}Kibellah silently appears by your side.{/n} "You asked to see me, Domin'{name}? Do you wish to learn more of the cult's rites? Very well. Since you are in the water, I can introduce you to a rare discipline of the Bloodspun Web known as controlled self-drowning. Few receive this honour, with water being so precious on a ship. Still, it has opened my eyes to many truths."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла неслышно возникает подле.{/n} "Ты желал{mf||а} видеть меня, Домин'{name}? Узнать обряды культа? Хорошо. Ты уже в воде. Значит, я могу познакомить тебя с одной из редких практик Кровавой паутины — контролируемым самоутоплением. Мало кому оказывается честь пройти ее — ведь вода бесценна на корабле. Она открыла мне многие истины".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah appears at your side without making a sound.{/n} "You wished to see me, Enim'{name}? To learn of the cult's rites? Very well. You are already in the water. That means I can introduce you to one of the disciplines of Ahn'shini: controlled self-drowning. It has opened many truths to me."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah appears at your side without making a sound.{/n} "You wished to see me, Enim'{name}? To learn of the cult's rites? Very well. You are already in the water. That means I can introduce you to one of the disciplines of Ahn'shini: controlled self-drowning. It has opened many truths to me."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah apparaît silencieusement à côté de vous.{/n} « Vous avez demandé à me voir, Domin'{name} ? Vous souhaitez en apprendre davantage sur les rites de notre culte ? Très bien. Puisque vous êtes dans l'eau, je peux vous faire découvrir une technique très particulière de la Toile de Sang que nous appelons la noyade contrôlée. Rares sont ceux à se voir accorder cet honneur tant l'eau est précieuse à bord d'un vaisseau. Pour autant, elle m'a ouvert les yeux sur de nombreuses vérités. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah silently appears by your side.{/n} "You asked to see me, Domin'{name}? Do you wish to learn more of the cult's rites? Very well. Since you are in the water, I can introduce you to a rare discipline of the Bloodspun Web known as controlled self-drowning. Few receive this honour, with water being so precious on a ship. Still, it has opened my eyes to many truths."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah apparaît silencieusement à côté de vous.{/n} « Vous avez demandé à me voir, Domin'{name} ? Vous souhaitez en apprendre davantage sur les rites de notre culte ? Très bien. Puisque vous êtes dans l'eau, je peux vous faire découvrir une technique très particulière de la Toile de Sang que nous appelons la noyade contrôlée. Rares sont ceux à se voir accorder cet honneur tant l'eau est précieuse à bord d'un vaisseau. Pour autant, elle m'a ouvert les yeux sur de nombreuses vérités. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Kibellah aparece a tu lado sin hacer el menor sonido.{/n} «¿Ha solicitado verme, Domin'{name}? ¿Quiere saber más sobre los ritos del culto? Muy bien. Ya que está en el agua, puedo enseñarle una disciplina singular de la Red Sanguinolenta conocida como autoahogamiento controlado. Es un honor poco común dada la poca agua que hay en una nave. Sin embargo, me ha abierto los ojos a muchas verdades».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah silently appears by your side.{/n} "You asked to see me, Domin'{name}? Do you wish to learn more of the cult's rites? Very well. Since you are in the water, I can introduce you to a rare discipline of the Bloodspun Web known as controlled self-drowning. Few receive this honour, with water being so precious on a ship. Still, it has opened my eyes to many truths."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah aparece a tu lado sin hacer el menor sonido.{/n} «¿Ha solicitado verme, Domin'{name}? ¿Quiere saber más sobre los ritos del culto? Muy bien. Ya que está en el agua, puedo enseñarle una disciplina singular de la Red Sanguinolenta conocida como autoahogamiento controlado. Es un honor poco común dada la poca agua que hay en una nave. Sin embargo, me ha abierto los ojos a muchas verdades».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈静悄悄地出现在你身边。{/n}“你想见我吗，秘者{name}？你想进一步了解拜死教的仪式吗？那很好。既然你已经身处水中，那我可以向你介绍织血罗网的戒律，为你举行自主溺水的仪式。很少有人能有幸参加这样的仪式，因为水实在是太珍贵了。不过，它让我洞悉了许多真相。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah silently appears by your side.{/n} "You asked to see me, Domin'{name}? Do you wish to learn more of the cult's rites? Very well. Since you are in the water, I can introduce you to a rare discipline of the Bloodspun Web known as controlled self-drowning. Few receive this honour, with water being so precious on a ship. Still, it has opened my eyes to many truths."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈静悄悄地出现在你身边。{/n}“你想见我吗，秘者{name}？你想进一步了解拜死教的仪式吗？那很好。既然你已经身处水中，那我可以向你介绍织血罗网的戒律，为你举行自主溺水的仪式。很少有人能有幸参加这样的仪式，因为水实在是太珍贵了。不过，它让我洞悉了许多真相。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}キベラは静かにあなたの元に現れた。{/n}「私に会いたかったんですよね、ドミン{name}？カルト儀式についてもっと知りたいのですか？承知しました。せっかく水の中にいるので、自己管理可能な溺死として知られているブラッドスパン・ウェブの珍しい訓練を紹介しましょう。このような名誉を受けられるのは一部のみです。水は船にとって貴重ですからね。それでも、これは私の目を開かせてくれました」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah silently appears by your side.{/n} "You asked to see me, Domin'{name}? Do you wish to learn more of the cult's rites? Very well. Since you are in the water, I can introduce you to a rare discipline of the Bloodspun Web known as controlled self-drowning. Few receive this honour, with water being so precious on a ship. Still, it has opened my eyes to many truths."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは静かにあなたの元に現れた。{/n}「私に会いたかったんですよね、ドミン{name}？カルト儀式についてもっと知りたいのですか？承知しました。せっかく水の中にいるので、自己管理可能な溺死として知られているブラッドスパン・ウェブの珍しい訓練を紹介しましょう。このような名誉を受けられるのは一部のみです。水は船にとって貴重ですからね。それでも、これは私の目を開かせてくれました」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Kibellah erscheint lautlos neben dir.{/n} "Ihr habt mich gerufen, Domin'{name}? Wollt Ihr mehr über die Rituale des Kults erfahren? Nun gut. Nachdem Ihr im Wasser seid, kann ich Euch mit einer seltenen Disziplin des Blutgesponnenen Netzes vertraut machen, die wir kontrollierte Selbstertränkung nennen. Nur wenigen wird diese Ehre zuteil, da Wasser auf einen Schiff ein wertvolles Gut ist. Und doch hat es mir viele Wahrheiten offenbart."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah silently appears by your side.{/n} "You asked to see me, Domin'{name}? Do you wish to learn more of the cult's rites? Very well. Since you are in the water, I can introduce you to a rare discipline of the Bloodspun Web known as controlled self-drowning. Few receive this honour, with water being so precious on a ship. Still, it has opened my eyes to many truths."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah erscheint lautlos neben dir.{/n} "Ihr habt mich gerufen, Domin'{name}? Wollt Ihr mehr über die Rituale des Kults erfahren? Nun gut. Nachdem Ihr im Wasser seid, kann ich Euch mit einer seltenen Disziplin des Blutgesponnenen Netzes vertraut machen, die wir kontrollierte Selbstertränkung nennen. Nur wenigen wird diese Ehre zuteil, da Wasser auf einen Schiff ein wertvolles Gut ist. Und doch hat es mir viele Wahrheiten offenbart."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Kibellah sessizce yanında beliriyor.{/n} "Beni mi görmek istedin Domin'{name}? Tarikat ayinleri hakkında daha fazla şey mi öğrenmek istiyordun? Pekâlâ. Suda olduğuna göre sana Kanipi Ağı'nda kontrollü öz boğulma olarak bilinen nadir bir disiplini tanıtayım. Gemide su çok değerli olduğu için bu onura fazla kişi erişemiyor. Yine de şahsen gözlerimi birçok gerçeğe açmıştır."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah silently appears by your side.{/n} "You asked to see me, Domin'{name}? Do you wish to learn more of the cult's rites? Very well. Since you are in the water, I can introduce you to a rare discipline of the Bloodspun Web known as controlled self-drowning. Few receive this honour, with water being so precious on a ship. Still, it has opened my eyes to many truths."
